title: Happy Birthday, Barack Obama
text:
The president is 54 years old today. Paige Lavender Senior Politics Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/04/2015 12:39 PM EDT | Edited: 08/04/2015 01:24 PM EDT 
Tuesday, Aug. 4, is President Barack Obama's 54th birthday. HuffPost 
Former President Bill Clinton wished Obama well on Twitter, saying he hoped Obama could sneak a piece of birthday cake past the first lady. Happy birthday, @POTUS ! Hopefully when @FLOTUS isn’t looking you can have some cake. #44turns54 — Bill Clinton (@billclinton) August 4, 2015 For more from The Huffington Post, download our app for iOS or Android .
